title: English Teaching Methodology Enhancement Course via Mobile-Supported Self-Regulated Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Emphasizing English communication skills in science for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can independently establish weekly English learning plans using smartphone-based self-regulated learning strategies.
In a flipped learning environment, learners combine video lectures with mobile quizzes (Quizlet/Kahoot) to master key scientific terms (e.g., climate change, nuclear power) with over 80% proficiency.
Through project-based assessment, learners can produce English-language science experiment explanation videos and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
